modName: Dagnar Ice-Breaker - Stealthy Nord Archer Follower
summary: Dagnar is a Nord archer, formally of the Dark Brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
Dagnar is a very simple follower that can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. He is a skilled stealthy archer and used to be a member of the Dark Brotherhood. For more information about him, check his inventory.

[list][*]light foot perk[/*]
[*]essential[/*]
[*]marriable (will open a general goods shop)[/*]
[*]will tolerate criminal behavior[/*]
[*]will stay in the area that you dismiss him for easy retrieval later[/*]
[/list]
Dagnar should work with or without any DLC. He should also be compatible with any follower mods as long as this mod is loaded before them.
author: BananaDongle
